feed.title: Combined summary - Some transcripts from Scaling Bitcoin 2016

entry.title: Combined summary - Some transcripts from Scaling Bitcoin 2016
entry.summary: The Scaling Bitcoin conference in Milan covered a variety of topics, including fungibility overview, Mimblewimble, lightning network routing, Schnorr signatures, and fast difficulty adjustment. There are links provided for each talk given at the conference, which provide valuable information on the specific topic being discussed. It is important to note that these are not exact transcripts of the talks and there may be typos or listening errors due to Bryan typing while listening to the talks. Despite this, the information provided can still offer insight into each topic presented at the conference.
